author: andreas
content:
Well, I really hope they will tidy it up ðŸ™‚

This complex of around 150 apartments was opened at the end of February. Imagine 150 families moving in at roughly the same time. It is inevitable that some things will be damaged, and so the final paint in staircases and corridors has not been applied yet. This will happen in about half a year when the initial storm is over. I suppose this pole (whatever it is) will vanish at about the same time.
